tags: None
review: It's a blessing to know such kind personality .She is always been a gentle guide towards any confusion regarding gynac.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My name is Deepa and am here to tell my experience with this super women Dr Gowri who is absolutely reliable. I have a PCOD problem since 15 years and cosulted various doctors across the states and almost every one prescribed me with high dosage of medicines which lead to side effects and i bloated too much. Finally i thought of consulting this doctor and went up to her and this happened before my marriage, i told her entire my history of medical treated in the past 15 years and she just wrote in prescription paper mentioning one metabolic tablet to increase metabolism. Ans she all told is that the table she is giving me is to support metabolism and she do not have to give me a treatment for my problem rather she asked me to reduce weigh by going to gym and yoga and diet for 3 months and asked me to consult her after 3 month with weight reduction and i did as she sdai, i went to yoga, joined gym and started diet but did not lose much weight in kilos but really impacted so much that i was regulaired with period and got married and concieved withing 3 months os my my marriage and post which i consulter her for delivery too and she really patietly handled for the noise i made throughout my deliver and gifted with lovely son. So guys with this am sure you should ahve understood that this Dr is not the one who beats around your bush. she is not the one who gives you to much of medicind and make you effected to side effect and she is very natural and you cam rely her 100%.

Thanks and Kudo to you Dr.

tags: None
review: I would highly recommend Dr. Gowri to anyone. She is a very friendly doctor with vast experience of 20 years. My wife as able to share all her doubts with her openly and Dr. Gowri gave us a motherly feeling while addressing our problem. She is not in favor of writing unnecessary tests and make huge bills, she recommends tests which she feels are highly necessary. She follows step by step approach in diagnosing the problem which makes her a perfect doctor. And instead of giving huge amount of medicines she emphasizes on eating lot of green vegetables and fruits in normal diet which out-stands her from the rest of doctors in the community.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I do not recommend this Doctor. ******* ** *** ******* ********** * **** **** * **** ****** ** *** ***** ********** She had not informed me about the risk of the baby during initial scans and suggested medicines. At 7th month, sudden things have happened like less blood circulation, less growth/oxygen, and sudden delivery happened in some other hospital. Though we were in Motherhood, Indiranagar for 3 days, as advised by Dr. Gowri, she did not visit us for 2 days. 3rd day she came and advised multiple scans. We went to another  hospital where the 1st delivery happened and came to know about the risk which I had in the initial stages.  Moreover, when I settled all the bills on the previous day evening to go to another hospital on the next day morning, the staff nurses were on night duty did not visit/attend me for the baby's health check up though I have requested multiple times. They said, any how you are going to the some other hospital, they will do the require test.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ***** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ** **** I was on my pregnancy checkup with one doctor.  Unfortunately that doctor fall sick on my due date. That doctor sent me to Gowri doctor.  I gained confidence once I visited her. I believe God sent her to me at the time of my delivery. My son is 5 yrs old now. Still she remember my son. I thank Dr. gowri for helping us throughout our journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had chosen Dr. Gowri for my 2nd delivery.
She was very experienced and made me feel at ease everytime I met her. She was always approchable for any query via what's app and call.I was very happy with her.
The team of nurses also are very good and were very helpful post delivery. Her guidance is really appreciated. 
Thank you for your all support.
Regards,
Abhilasha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Gowri is awesome doctor. we consulted her during my wife pregnancy. We visited clinic more than 20 times. Clinic is very neat and clean, you can feel like lovely home. She will listen to all pregnancy related problem very patiently and gives proper suggestions. Also, she spends much time with patients. She wont suggest unnecessary medication and tests. 
Dr is always smiley and positive in nature, makes patient more comfortable and boost positive energy. Post pregnancy also we are continuing consultation.
I would recommend Dr. Gowri. 
-Tanuja A

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am very happy while talking to Dr Gowri. I will highly recommend her for pregnancy consulting.
She creates a comfortable environment and understand what patient is going through.
She is not in favor of writing unnecessary tests and make huge bills, she recommends tests which she feels are highly necessary.
6th month completed for my wife Deepti Jain, we are hoping for normal Delivery. we used to visit every month for regular check-up. 
Instead of giving huge amount of medicines, She always advise for walk, juice and focus on diet.

tags: None
review: *** ** *********** *** ** *** **** ******* ********* ** ******* ********* **** ***** ****** ************ ************* We used to frequently visit her for consultation in Amrita Clinic in Basavanagar. My wife delivered a healthy baby boy last week with the help of Dr.Gowri. We are extremely happy to recomend her to any expecting couples.

tags: None
review: I found her name in practo after my wife's pregnancy got confirmed. We consuled her from first month. She never advice unnecessary medication.  She always answers our questions with patience  and finally our baby got delivered in her hands through normal delivery.  Thanks to both doctor and motherhood hospital.

*** ***** ** *** **** **** ****** * **** **** ***** **** *** **** ******** ***** ******

WE WAISTED OUR 1 YEAR *** **** **** * *** FOR PCOS AND PRE-PREGNANCY TREATMENT.

***** ** **** ******* WAIT TIME MORE THAN 2 HOURS. GOWRI WILL NEVER SPEND MORE THAN 1 MINUTE PER PATIENT. THEY WILL TAKE MONEY WITHOUT GIVING BILL. * ** ***** ** ****** *** ****** *** **** ***** ** ******

VERY VERY BAD AND PATHETIC EXPERIENCE. NEVER EVER RECOMMEND THIS DOCTOR *** ** * *** ********** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We went there for treatment. My appointment time was 3.30 but they delayed till 5.00. we are suffering with some issue and we tried to contact Dr Gowri but all the time she disconnected the phone. My personal recommendation don't destroy ur health, money and time  behind Dr Gowri.

tags: None
review: Dr. Gowri creates a comfortable environment and has patience to listen and understand what patient is going through.  Though we were nervous before we went in for the first check up but her words made us feel better and positive.  I will definitely recommend Dr. Gowri

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: I will highly recommend Dr. Gowri for pregnancy consulting. She treats patients very well. Even though she is busy with lot of appointments she ensures to give enough time (10-15 min) to the patient and counsel them accordingly. *** ** ****** **** *********** *** always avoid unnecessary medical tests.

tags: None
review: *** ** ******* ****** ****** Post delivery she won't even come to hospital to check the patient. *** ***** ** ********** ** ******* **** ***** She will make it look like she is not going to give extra test and medicine but at the end of the day she will make sure you do all of them. Just that she will give good explanation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent doctor. Highly recommended for pregnancy. She won't prescribe unnecessary test or medicine. My wife is type 2 diabetic. I was worried about her pregnancy and child development. We are happy that we have consulted her clinic (Amrita Health Care). Now we have healthy boy.
